--- Axis / Lokk ---

Axis nods seriously, and whispers back, "Yes Sir. You want me to 
make some "routine checks" of the ship, in coincidental locations." 
He smiles to himself, thinking that his words were clever. He heads 
back to the others, but stays behind them, and out of sight; 
pretending to make adjustments and such on just about everything.

Lokk continues scouting the perimeter of the Chivitron base.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He nodded and gestured for Axis to follow him.  Once they 
were out of 
> hearing range of all of the other bots he began to whisper.  "I 
need you to 
> follow them.  But stay out of sight.  Something just doesn't feel 
right about 
> them.  And I want you to keep an eye on Nightlight.  Make sure 
they don't do 
> anything to her.  Thank you."
